analytic.title: Kolophone armenischer Übersetzer syrischer Literatur (12.–13. Jahrhundert)

monogr.title: Արևելյան Աղբյուրագիտություն / Studies in Oriental Sources

biblStruct.note: This article deals about colophons and translator's commentaries on literary works translated from classical Syriac into Armenian language in the kingdom of Cilicia in the 12th-13th centuries. Examined are the expressions and terms that provide information about the subsequent processes of revision and reworking of the works translated from Syriac into Armenian.

body.bibl: Schmidt, Andrea B., and Azat Bozoyan. “Kolophone Armenischer Übersetzer Syrischer Literatur (12.–13. Jahrhundert).” Արևելյան Աղբյուրագիտություն / Studies in Oriental Sources 3 (2022): 135–71. https://doi.org/https://doi.org/10.56549/29537819.

Andrea B. Schmidt and Azat Bozoyan, Kolophone Armenischer Übersetzer Syrischer Literatur (12.–13. Jahrhundert), Արևելյան Աղբյուրագիտություն / Studies in Oriental Sources 3 (2022): 135–71, https://doi.org/https://doi.org/10.56549/29537819.
